import React from 'react' import styles from './Card.module.css' import maleIcon from '../../assets/maleicon.png' import femaleIcon from '../../assets/femaleicona.png' const Card = ({ character }) => { return (
{/* {console.log(character)} */}

{character.name}

Origem

{character.origin.name === 'unknown' ? "Desconhecida" : character.origin.name}

Espécie

{character.specie}

) } export default Card
